output_list.reason: The function `mint` does not properly check for overflow when updating the `totalSupply_` and `balances` variables. This can lead to an integer overflow, allowing an attacker to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.

The function `addExp` does not properly check for overflow when updating the `currentExp` variable. This can lead to an integer overflow, allowing an attacker to manipulate the experience points of a hero instance.

The function `levelUp` does not properly check for overflow when updating the `currentLevel`, `currentExp`, and `addressToGoldDeposit` variables. This can lead to an integer overflow, allowing an attacker to bypass level up requirements.
